Results.Summary: TRANSMISSION KEPT POPPING OUT OF GEAR.  ORIGINAL AND REPLACEMENT TRANSMISSION FAILED IN 1 YEAR.  BMW STATES THAT IT ISN'T WORTHY OF RECALL BECAUSE IT IS TOO RARE.  IT CAN'T BE THAT RARE IF IT HAPPENED TO ME TWICE, AND  TO A FRIEND ONCE IN THE LAST YEAR. *AK
ON TWO SEPARATE OCCASIONS THE VEHICLE  SUDDENLY ACCELERATED, CAUSING A  COLLISION. THE DEALER HAS BEEN NOTIFIED.   *AK

Results.Summary: CONSUMER WAS DRIVING AT 10 MPH. WHILE PULLING FROM A STOP LIGHT ANOTHER VEHICLE HIT THE CONSUMER'S VEHICLE ON THE RIGHT. UPON IMPACT,  DRIVER'S SIDE AND PASSENGER'S SIDE AIR BAGS DIDN'T DEPLOY.  THE VEHICLE WAS STRUCK AT A HIGH RATE OF SPEED.  *AK
